name: Kekommunity
description:
You find yourself lost in a cozy land and need to form the perfect team to overcome the challenges and go back home!

A quick game with some light RPG mechanics where you must optimize your team roster combining their different stats. Your character is randomized at the start so each run will play out a bit different!

Features 21 cute characters - 18 of them playable.

Our very first game for a jam. This was lots of fun and chaos to develop!
Made in 48 hours for the Wholesome Game Jam 2022 with the theme Community!

Made by Majocamcam and HideousArmor :)
